name: Blackjack In Space
description:
Blackjack In Space presents players with a peaceful Blackjack gambling simulation that takes place in outer space! Experience the highs and the lows in real-time as you try to double your money on every single blackjack hand.

Blackjack In Space
  • Experience the peaceful gambling nature presented in 'Blackjack In Space'.
  • Every hand matters! Every win or loss presents intense moments and dramatic possibilities!
  • Practice betting strategies to master blackjack and earn great profits!
  • Build your balance and move up the all-time Steam Leaderboards with every winning bet.
  • Earn Blackjack Achievements! (Steam Achievements integration)

Steam Features

  • Steam Leaderboards.
  • Steam Achievements.
